title: The Atlanteens: Truth
description: The truth will set you free.  In the not so distant future sixteen year old Maya lives in paradise. The last inhabitable place on Earth that is protected by a group of people referred to only as, the Watchers.  But Maya soon learns that her home is not all that is seems and a dark secret lies within the boundaries of the world she has loved since the day she was born.  The day of the Ascension Ceremony is coming soon and should be marked by joyous celebrations, but instead Maya is forced to fight to gain her freedom.  She will be torn apart from those she loves. She will question those she trusts and she will learn and grow within herself to be what she was destined to be.  Maya is an Atlanteen, and the truth will set her free.
author: Ami Noone
